title: Fix registration completion flow for all user roles

requirements.text: Fix the registration completion navigation for Participant role so that after completing the registration form in RegistrationPage.tsx, users are successfully redirected to the ParticipantDashboard

quotes: i need you to fix the app when someone completes registration its not working at all none of them whther as participant or provider or whichever they all arent working

acceptanceCriteria: After submitting the participant registration form, the user navigates to /dashboard/participant
The ParticipantDashboard loads successfully with Kenyan-localized dummy data
No console errors occur during the navigation

requirements.text: Fix the registration completion navigation for Provider role so that after completing the registration form in RegistrationPage.tsx, users are successfully redirected to the ProviderDashboard

quotes: i need you to fix the app when someone completes registration its not working at all none of them whther as participant or provider or whichever they all arent working

acceptanceCriteria: After submitting the provider registration form, the user navigates to /dashboard/provider
The ProviderDashboard loads successfully with Kenyan-localized dummy data
No console errors occur during the navigation

requirements.text: Fix the registration completion navigation for Plan Manager role so that after completing the registration form in RegistrationPage.tsx, users are successfully redirected to the PlanManagerDashboard

quotes: i need you to fix the app when someone completes registration its not working at all none of them whther as participant or provider or whichever they all arent working

The PlanManagerDashboard loads successfully with Kenyan-localized dummy data

requirements.text: Investigate and fix any backend issues preventing successful profile creation that may be blocking registration completion for all user roles

quotes: i need you to fix the app when someone completes registration its not working at all none of them whther as participant or provider or whichever they all arent working

acceptanceCriteria: Profile creation mutations complete successfully in the backend
User role assignment persists correctly after registration
Backend returns appropriate success responses to the frontend

constraints: Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts or frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts
Do not change the existing dashboard routes structure in App.tsx
Maintain the Kenyan localization in all dummy data
nonGoals: Changing the registration form fields or validation logic
Modifying the dashboard UI layouts or components
Replacing dummy data with real data sources
Adding new user roles beyond the existing four
